definition: clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to

sentences.english: "Yet even in those days, " declares the LORD , "I will not destroy you completely.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华说，就是到那时，我也不将你们毁灭净尽。

sentences.english: The patient's high fever deleted most of his memories.
sentences.chinese: 病人的高烧使他的影象丧失净尽。

sentences.english: Whatever your parents dislike, you should carefully try to remove for them.
sentences.chinese: 父母亲所厌恶的事物，要谨慎地为父母亲去除净尽。

sentences.english: The ganstershave been eliminated and can no longer harm the people.
sentences.chinese: 这股顽匪已被劫灭净尽，再不能祸害百姓了。

sentences.english: For thus hath the LORD said, The whole land shall be desolate; yet will I not make a full end.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华如此说，全地必然荒凉，我却不毁灭净尽。

sentences.english: This is what the LORD says: "The whole land will be ruined, though I will not destroy it completely."
sentences.chinese: 耶和华如此说，全地必然荒凉，我却不毁灭净尽。

definition: vanished from the face of the earth/all gone/nothing left
variant of 蕩然|荡然[dang4 ran2]
to wash away/to eliminate/to do away with
wear and tear/to wear away over time
